title: How Many Calories in Sushi?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in sushi per piece, including macros like carbs from rice, protein from fish, and tips for variations to fit your diet.
assumptions: 1 piece of nigiri sushi (e.g., tuna: ~20g cooked rice + 20g raw fish topping); no added sauces or garnishes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (nigiri, roll, sashimi), fish variety, rice portion, and preparation; check restaurant info or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One piece of nigiri sushi has about 45 kcal, mostly from rice carbs and fish protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged or restaurant sushi.

tweaks.label: California roll piece (with avocado and crab)

faqs.q: How many calories in one piece of sushi?
faqs.a: About 45 kcal for a standard nigiri piece.
Yes, mainly from sushi rice; ~6.5 g per nigiri piece.

faqs.q: How many calories in a sushi roll?
faqs.a: A full 6-8 piece roll averages 300-400 kcal, depending on fillings.
Yes, due to seasoned rice and soy sauce; ~120 mg per piece.
Opt for sashimi (fish only, ~30 kcal/piece) or veggie rolls to reduce calories.
